Blind Girl and Angel

モウモク(モウモク)少(しょう)女(じょ)と(と)テンシ(テンシ)様(さま)MOUMOKU shoujo to TENSHI-sama

"Angel Alive"

"So, the angels were alive."
M

A song about the lone survivor of a war, and her angel savior.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song released on E.A.T PROLOGUE. Its PV was uploaded to niconico and YouTube on February 25, 2021.
  • Instrumental: An instrumental of the original released on E.A.T PROLOGUE.

Albums

Notes

  • The PV reuses mothy's illustrations from E.A.T PROLOGUE along with new illustrations by Ichika.
  • The lyrics reference those of The Daughter of Evil.
